title: Reverse Annie Idea
body: So my friends and I have discussed this before, but who else thinks that the Reverse Annie Skin should allow the player to control Tibbers who summons Annie? I feel this would be pretty cool having a complete reversal of roles :P

replies.body:
How would that even work?

And keep in mind, that a skin doesn't change gameplay, only visuals.
I think he means you play as Tibbers instead of Annie, and your ult summons Annie instead of Tibbers. Not actually you play as a flaming bear and can summon the little queen of burst herself.
That's exactly what I meant, thank's Diamond! ^-^
yeah, no, that would never happen. you need clarity in multiplayer games or it's unfair to one team. and there is no clarity in that. dumb idea.

I understand it's difficult as a newcomer so this may seem like a bad idea, however, a complete reversal of the role of Tibbers (As the champion) and Annie (as Tibbers' ultimate) it would be an interesting concept. :)
